column4: ubotu..think you could help me with something? Ubuntu is the only distro so far that i can use for my laptop(inspiron 6000) debian, centos, fedora, freebsd, mandriva all leave me with an unusual gui due to my graphics chipset....ubuntu works perfectly but i see there is an update available in xorg..think if i update il have probs?
ubotu is a bot ;). updates *should* be safe, but there's no guarantee
in general you should use the latest available package provided by the ubuntu archives
